machine_learning_dir.ml_support module

machine_learning_dir.ml_support.train_model(data_dct, run_name, num_evals, search_space_dct) → None[source]

This function is the puplic function used by the end user. The purpose is to train N models. The models, their parameters, and scores are saved with MLflow.

Parameters:

  • data_dct (dict) – Contains both the training data and the validation data

  • run_name (str) – The name of the experiment

  • num_evals (int) – The number of models that will be trained

  • search_space_dct (dict) – A dictionary containing the search space used to control the hyperopt parameters in order to build N models
